Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Foreign.ForeignPtr_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import Foreign.Concurrent_LHAssumptions()
 6: import Foreign.ForeignPtr
 7: import GHC.ForeignPtr_LHAssumptions()
 8: 
 9: {-@
10: 
11: assume GHC.ForeignPtr.withForeignPtr :: forall a b. fp:(GHC.ForeignPtr.ForeignPtr a)
12:   -> ((PtrN a (fplen fp)) -> GHC.Types.IO b)
13:   -> (GHC.Types.IO b)
14: 
15: assume Foreign.ForeignPtr.Imp.newForeignPtr ::  _ -> p:(PtrV a) -> (GHC.Types.IO (ForeignPtrN a (plen p)))
16: 
17: 
18: //  this uses `sizeOf (undefined :: a)`, so the ForeignPtr does not necessarily have length `n`
19: //  Foreign.ForeignPtr.Imp.mallocForeignPtrArray :: (Foreign.Storable.Storable a) => n:Nat -> IO (ForeignPtrN a n)
20: @-}
